remarks: Specialization with 2 quantifiers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Aug-2017.)
statement:
spc2ed.x $e |- F/ x ch $.
spc2ed.y $e |- F/ y ch $.
spc2ed.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = A /\ y = B ) ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
spc2d $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) ) -> ( A. x A. y ps -> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x y $.
